name: LOUISIANA STATE UNIVERSITY OFFICE OF RESEARCH AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT
description: Education, Research & Development, and Economic Development.
sampleDescriptions: Advocacy before the Department of Energy (DOE), specifically setting up and facilitating meetings with the DOE Office of Science to discuss long-term applied research funding opportunities for the LSU
Setting up and facilitating meetings with the Department of Energy's Office of Science to discuss long-term applied research funding opportunities for the LSU Center for Energy Innovation.
